Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.electronicseal

Class PDFElectronicSealParams

java.lang.Object
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.electronicseal.PDFElectronicSealParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
PDFServicesJobParams
public class PDFElectronicSealParams extends Object implements PDFServicesJobParams
Parameters for electronically seal PDFs using PDFElectronicSealJob.
